Texto: 
blind in both eyes
n/a
axial mr images demonstrate encephalomalacia of the lateral lenticular nuclei bilaterally
methanol toxicity, putamen (basal ganglia)
• methanol toxicity
• ethylene glycol
• carbon monoxide
• no2 toxicity
this 46 y.o. man had a toxic ingestion many years prior
